segments.text: I am waiting for a fax but just now I found there ’ s something wrong with the fax machine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s wrong with the fax machine ? Is it urgent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , very urgent . And there is no other fax machine around . And the office of our boss is closed , so I can not use his machine either . And his secretary is out . Do you have any suggestion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Either call this extension number 0085 or ask them to send the fax to you as e-mail , you print it out .
segments.speaker: S2
